description: Educational video highlights analyzer – segments video at key instructional moments and extracts metadata for each segment.

config.segmentationDefinition: Segment the video at each significant instructional moment that contributes to a coherent learning narrative: Topic Introductions, Key Concept Definitions, Explanations, Demonstrations, Examples, Visual Illustrations, Summary/Recap points, Q&A exchanges, Interactive prompts (e.g. quiz questions), Transitions between sections, Speaker emphasis moments, and other pedagogical events. Each segment should capture exactly one instructional unit.

StartTimeMs.description: Start time of this segment in milliseconds.

EndTimeMs.description: End time of this segment in milliseconds.

Description.description: One-sentence natural language summary of what is taught in this segment.

InstructionEvent.description: Specific instructional moment in this segment.

SpeakerName.description: Name of the instructor or speaker (if displayed or recognizable).

SlideTitle.description: Title or heading of any slide or on-screen graphic shown.

KeyConcept.description: Primary concept or term introduced or emphasized.

ExampleDetail.description: Brief description of the example or analogy used.

VisualAid.description: Type of visual aid present in the segment.

AudienceQuestion.description: Text of any question posed by the audience or host.

AnswerSummary.description: One-sentence summary of the response or explanation given.

EmphasisLevel.description: Estimated emphasis level in the speaker’s tone.

HighlightScore.description: AI-generated importance score (0.0–1.0) for this instructional segment.
